name: MSP_API_VERSION
description: Provides the MSP protocol version and the INAV API version.

name: MSP_FC_VARIANT
description: Identifies the flight controller firmware variant (e.g., INAV, Betaflight).

name: MSP_FC_VERSION
description: Provides the specific version number of the flight controller firmware.

name: MSP_BOARD_INFO
description: Provides information about the specific hardware board and its capabilities.

fields.name: `hardwareRevision`
fields.description: Hardware revision number. 0 if not detected (`USE_HARDWARE_REVISION_DETECTION`).

fields.name: `osdSupport`
fields.description: OSD chip type: 0=None, 2=Onboard (`USE_OSD`). INAV does not support slave OSD (1).

fields.name: `commCapabilities`
fields.description: Communication capabilities bitmask: Bit 0=VCP support (`USE_VCP`), Bit 1=SoftSerial support (`USE_SOFTSERIAL1`/`2`).

fields.name: `targetNameLength`
fields.description: Length of the target name string that follows.

fields.name: `targetName`
fields.description: Target name string (e.g., "MATEKF405"). Length given by previous field.

name: MSP_BUILD_INFO
description: Provides build date, time, and Git revision of the firmware.

name: MSP_INAV_PID
description: Retrieves legacy INAV-specific PID controller related settings. Many fields are now obsolete or placeholders.

fields.name: `headingHoldRateLimit`
fields.description: Max rate for heading hold P term (`pidProfile()->heading_hold_rate_limit`).

fields.name: `headingHoldLpfFreq`
fields.description: Fixed LPF frequency for heading hold error (`HEADING_HOLD_ERROR_LPF_FREQ`).

name: MSP_SET_INAV_PID
description: Sets legacy INAV-specific PID controller related settings.

name: MSP_NAME
description: Returns the user-defined craft name.

fields.name: `craftName`
fields.description: The craft name string (`systemConfig()->craftName`). Null termination is *not* explicitly sent, the length is determined by the payload size.

name: MSP_SET_NAME
description: Sets the user-defined craft name.

fields.name: `craftName`
fields.description: The new craft name string. Automatically null-terminated by the FC.

name: MSP_NAV_POSHOLD
description: Retrieves navigation position hold and general manual/auto flight parameters. Some parameters depend on the platform type (Multirotor vs Fixed Wing).

fields.name: `maxAutoClimbRate`
fields.description: Max climb rate in autonomous modes (uses `fw.max_auto_climb_rate` or `mc.max_auto_climb_rate` based on platform).

fields.name: `maxManualSpeed`
fields.description: Max speed in manual modes with GPS aiding (`navConfig()->general.max_manual_speed`).

fields.name: `maxManualClimbRate`
fields.description: Max climb rate in manual modes with GPS aiding (uses `fw.max_manual_climb_rate` or `mc.max_manual_climb_rate`).

fields.name: `mcMaxBankAngle`
fields.description: Max bank angle for multirotor position hold (`navConfig()->mc.max_bank_angle`).

name: MSP_SET_NAV_POSHOLD
description: Sets navigation position hold and general manual/auto flight parameters.

fields.name: `maxAutoClimbRate`
fields.description: Sets `fw.max_auto_climb_rate` or `mc.max_auto_climb_rate` based on current platform type.

name: MSP_CALIBRATION_DATA
description: Retrieves sensor calibration data (Accelerometer zero/gain, Magnetometer zero/gain, Optical Flow scale).

fields.name: `accCalibAxisFlags`
fields.description: Flags indicating which axes of the accelerometer have been calibrated (`accGetCalibrationAxisFlags()`).

fields.name: `magZeroX`
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for X-axis (`compassConfig()->magZero.raw[X]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magZeroY`
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for Y-axis (`compassConfig()->magZero.raw[Y]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magZeroZ`
fields.description: Magnetometer zero offset for Z-axis (`compassConfig()->magZero.raw[Z]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `opflowScale`
fields.description: Optical flow scale factor (`opticalFlowConfig()->opflow_scale * 256`). 0 if `USE_OPFLOW` disabled.

fields.name: `magGainX`
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for X-axis (`compassConfig()->magGain[X]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magGainY`
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for Y-axis (`compassConfig()->magGain[Y]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magGainZ`
fields.description: Magnetometer gain/scale for Z-axis (`compassConfig()->magGain[Z]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

name: MSP_SET_CALIBRATION_DATA
description: Sets sensor calibration data.

name: MSP_POSITION_ESTIMATION_CONFIG
description: Retrieves parameters related to the INAV position estimation fusion weights and GPS minimum satellite count.

fields.name: `minSats`
fields.description: Minimum satellites required for GPS use (`gpsConfigMutable()->gpsMinSats`).

fields.name: `useGPSVelNED`
fields.description: Legacy flag, always 1 (GPS velocity is always used if available).

name: MSP_SET_POSITION_ESTIMATION_CONFIG
description: Sets parameters related to the INAV position estimation fusion weights and GPS minimum satellite count.

name: MSP_RTH_AND_LAND_CONFIG
description: Retrieves configuration parameters related to Return-to-Home (RTH) and automatic landing behaviors.

fields.name: `minRthDistance`
fields.description: Minimum distance from home required for RTH to engage (`navConfig()->general.min_rth_distance`).

fields.name: `rthClimbFirst`
fields.description: Flag: Climb to RTH altitude before returning (`navConfig()->general.flags.rth_climb_first`).

fields.name: `rthClimbIgnoreEmerg`
fields.description: Flag: Climb even in emergency RTH (`navConfig()->general.flags.rth_climb_ignore_emerg`).

fields.name: `rthAllowLanding`
fields.description: Flag: Allow automatic landing after RTH (`navConfig()->general.flags.rth_allow_landing`).

fields.name: `rthAbortThreshold`
fields.description: Stick input threshold to abort RTH (`navConfig()->general.rth_abort_threshold`).

fields.name: `landMinAltVspd`
fields.description: Landing vertical speed at minimum slowdown altitude (`navConfig()->general.land_minalt_vspd`).

fields.name: `landMaxAltVspd`
fields.description: Landing vertical speed at maximum slowdown altitude (`navConfig()->general.land_maxalt_vspd`).

fields.name: `emergDescentRate`
fields.description: Vertical speed during emergency landing descent (`navConfig()->general.emerg_descent_rate`).

name: MSP_SET_RTH_AND_LAND_CONFIG
description: Sets configuration parameters related to Return-to-Home (RTH) and automatic landing behaviors.

name: MSP_FW_CONFIG
description: Retrieves configuration parameters specific to Fixed Wing navigation.

fields.name: `maxDiveAngle`
fields.description: Maximum negative pitch angle during descent (`navConfig()->fw.max_dive_angle`).

name: MSP_SET_FW_CONFIG
description: Sets configuration parameters specific to Fixed Wing navigation.

name: MSP_MODE_RANGES
description: Returns all defined mode activation ranges (aux channel assignments for flight modes).

fields.name: `modePermanentId`
fields.description: Permanent ID of the flight mode (maps to `boxId` via `findBoxByActiveBoxId`). 0 if entry unused.

fields.name: `auxChannelIndex`
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel used for activation.

fields.name: `rangeStartStep`
fields.description: Start step (corresponding to channel value range 900-2100 in steps of 50/25, depends on steps calculation).

fields.name: `rangeEndStep`
fields.description: End step for the activation range.

name: MSP_SET_MODE_RANGE
description: Sets a single mode activation range by its index.

fields.name: `rangeIndex`
fields.description: Index of the mode range to set (0 to `MAX_MODE_ACTIVATION_CONDITION_COUNT - 1`).

fields.name: `modePermanentId`
fields.description: Permanent ID of the flight mode to assign.

name: MSP_FEATURE
description: Returns a bitmask of enabled features.

name: MSP_SET_FEATURE
description: Sets the enabled features using a bitmask. Clears all previous features first.

name: MSP_BOARD_ALIGNMENT
description: Returns the sensor board alignment angles relative to the craft frame.

name: MSP_SET_BOARD_ALIGNMENT
description: Sets the sensor board alignment angles.

name: MSP_CURRENT_METER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for the current sensor.

fields.name: `scale`
fields.description: Current sensor scale factor (`batteryMetersConfig()->current.scale`). Units depend on sensor type.

fields.name: `capacity`
fields.description: Battery capacity (constrained 0-65535) (`currentBatteryProfile->capacity.value`). Note: This is legacy, use `MSP2_INAV_BATTERY_CONFIG` for full 32-bit capacity.

name: MSP_SET_CURRENT_METER_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for the current sensor.

name: MSP_MIXER
description: Retrieves the mixer type (Legacy, INAV always returns QuadX).

name: MSP_SET_MIXER
description: Sets the mixer type (Legacy, ignored by INAV).

fields.name: `mixerMode`
fields.description: Mixer mode to set (ignored by INAV).

name: MSP_RX_CONFIG
description: Retrieves receiver configuration settings. Some fields are Betaflight compatibility placeholders.

fields.name: `maxCheck`
fields.description: Upper channel value threshold for stick commands (`rxConfig()->maxcheck`).

fields.name: `minCheck`
fields.description: Lower channel value threshold for stick commands (`rxConfig()->mincheck`).

name: MSP_SET_RX_CONFIG
description: Sets receiver configuration settings.

name: MSP_LED_COLORS
description: Retrieves the HSV color definitions for configurable LED colors.

name: MSP_SET_LED_COLORS
description: Sets the HSV color definitions for configurable LED colors.

name: MSP_LED_STRIP_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configuration for each LED on the strip (legacy packed format).

fields.name: `legacyLedConfig`
fields.description: Packed LED configuration (position, function, overlay, color, direction, params). See C code for bit packing details.

name: MSP_SET_LED_STRIP_CONFIG
description: Sets the configuration for a single LED on the strip using the legacy packed format.

fields.name: `ledIndex`
fields.description: Index of the LED to configure (0 to `LED_MAX_STRIP_LENGTH - 1`).

name: MSP_RSSI_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the channel used for analog RSSI input.

fields.name: `rssiChannel`
fields.description: AUX channel index (1-based) used for RSSI, or 0 if disabled (`rxConfig()->rssi_channel`).

name: MSP_SET_RSSI_CONFIG
description: Sets the channel used for analog RSSI input.

fields.name: `rssiChannel`
fields.description: AUX channel index (1-based) to use for RSSI, or 0 to disable.

name: MSP_ADJUSTMENT_RANGES
description: Returns all defined RC adjustment ranges (tuning via aux channels).

fields.name: `adjustmentIndex`
fields.description: Index of the adjustment slot (0 to `MAX_SIMULTANEOUS_ADJUSTMENT_COUNT - 1`).

fields.name: `auxChannelIndex`
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel controlling the adjustment value.

fields.name: `rangeStartStep`
fields.description: Start step (0-20) of the control channel range.

fields.name: `rangeEndStep`
fields.description: End step (0-20) of the control channel range.

fields.name: `adjustmentFunction`
fields.description: Function/parameter being adjusted (e.g., PID gain, rate). See `rcAdjustments.h` enum.

fields.name: `auxSwitchChannelIndex`
fields.description: 0-based index of the AUX channel acting as an enable switch (or 0 if always enabled).

name: MSP_SET_ADJUSTMENT_RANGE
description: Sets a single RC adjustment range configuration by its index.

fields.name: `rangeIndex`
fields.description: Index of the adjustment range to set (0 to `MAX_ADJUSTMENT_RANGE_COUNT - 1`).

fields.name: `auxChannelIndex`
fields.description: 0-based index of the control AUX channel.

fields.name: `auxSwitchChannelIndex`
fields.description: 0-based index of the enable switch AUX channel (or 0).

name: MSP_VOLTAGE_METER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves legacy voltage meter configuration (scaled values).

fields.name: `vbatScale`
fields.description: Voltage sensor scale factor / 10 (`batteryMetersConfig()->voltage.scale / 10`). 0 if `USE_ADC` disabled.

name: MSP_SET_VOLTAGE_METER_CONFIG
description: Sets legacy voltage meter configuration (scaled values).

name: MSP_SONAR_ALTITUDE
description: Retrieves the altitude measured by the primary rangefinder (sonar or lidar).

fields.name: `rangefinderAltitude`
fields.description: Latest altitude reading from the rangefinder (`rangefinderGetLatestAltitude()`). 0 if `USE_RANGEFINDER` disabled or no reading.

name: MSP_RX_MAP
description: Retrieves the RC channel mapping array (AETR, etc.).

fields.name: `rcMap`
fields.description: Array defining the mapping from input channel index to logical function (Roll, Pitch, Yaw, Throttle, Aux1...).

name: MSP_SET_RX_MAP
description: Sets the RC channel mapping array.

fields.name: `rcMap`
fields.description: Array defining the new channel mapping.

name: MSP_REBOOT
description: Commands the flight controller to reboot.

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_SUMMARY
description: Retrieves summary information about the onboard dataflash chip (if present and used for Blackbox via FlashFS).

fields.name: `flashReady`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if flash chip is ready, 0 otherwise. (`flashIsReady()`). 0 if `USE_FLASHFS` disabled.

fields.name: `sectorCount`
fields.description: Total number of sectors on the flash chip (`geometry->sectors`). 0 if `USE_FLASHFS` disabled.

fields.name: `totalSize`
fields.description: Total size of the flash chip in bytes (`geometry->totalSize`). 0 if `USE_FLASHFS` disabled.

fields.name: `usedSize`
fields.description: Currently used size in bytes (FlashFS offset) (`flashfsGetOffset()`). 0 if `USE_FLASHFS` disabled.

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_READ
description: Reads a block of data from the onboard dataflash (FlashFS).

fields.name: `address`
fields.description: Starting address to read from within the FlashFS volume.

fields.name: `size`
fields.description: (Optional) Number of bytes to read. Defaults to 128 if not provided.

name: MSP_DATAFLASH_ERASE
description: Erases the entire onboard dataflash chip (FlashFS volume).

name: MSP_LOOP_TIME
description: Retrieves the configured loop time (PID loop frequency denominator).

name: MSP_SET_LOOP_TIME
description: Sets the configured loop time.

name: MSP_FAILSAFE_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the failsafe configuration settings.

fields.name: `failsafeOffDelay`
fields.description: Delay after signal recovery before returning control (`failsafeConfig()->failsafe_off_delay`).

fields.name: `failsafeRecoveryDelay`
fields.description: Delay after RTH finishes before attempting recovery (`failsafeConfig()->failsafe_recovery_delay`).

fields.name: `failsafeStickThreshold`
fields.description: Stick movement threshold to exit failsafe (`failsafeConfig()->failsafe_stick_motion_threshold`).

fields.name: `failsafeMinDistance`
fields.description: Minimum distance from home for RTH failsafe (`failsafeConfig()->failsafe_min_distance`).

fields.name: `failsafeMinDistanceProc`
fields.description: Failsafe procedure if below min distance (`failsafeConfig()->failsafe_min_distance_procedure`).

name: MSP_SET_FAILSAFE_CONFIG
description: Sets the failsafe configuration settings.

name: MSP_SDCARD_SUMMARY
description: Retrieves summary information about the SD card status and filesystem.

fields.name: `sdCardSupported`
fields.description: Bitmask: Bit 0 = 1 if SD card support compiled in (`USE_SDCARD`).

fields.name: `sdCardState`
fields.description: Enum (`mspSDCardState_e`): Current state (Not Present, Fatal, Card Init, FS Init, Ready). 0 if `USE_SDCARD` disabled.

fields.name: `fsError`
fields.description: Last filesystem error code (`afatfs_getLastError()`). 0 if `USE_SDCARD` disabled.

fields.name: `freeSpaceKB`
fields.description: Free space in KiB (`afatfs_getContiguousFreeSpace() / 1024`). 0 if `USE_SDCARD` disabled.

fields.name: `totalSpaceKB`
fields.description: Total space in KiB (`sdcard_getMetadata()->numBlocks / 2`). 0 if `USE_SDCARD` disabled.

name: MSP_BLACKBOX_CONFIG
description: Legacy command to retrieve Blackbox configuration. Superseded by `MSP2_BLACKBOX_CONFIG`.

name: MSP_OSD_CONFIG
description: Retrieves OSD configuration settings and layout for screen 0.

fields.name: `videoSystem`
fields.description: Video system (Auto/PAL/NTSC) (`osdConfig()->video_system`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `units`
fields.description: Measurement units (Metric/Imperial) (`osdConfig()->units`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `rssiAlarm`
fields.description: RSSI alarm threshold (`osdConfig()->rssi_alarm`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `capAlarm`
fields.description: Capacity alarm threshold (`currentBatteryProfile->capacity.warning`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `timerAlarm`
fields.description: Timer alarm threshold (`osdConfig()->time_alarm`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `altAlarm`
fields.description: Altitude alarm threshold (`osdConfig()->alt_alarm`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `distAlarm`
fields.description: Distance alarm threshold (`osdConfig()->dist_alarm`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `negAltAlarm`
fields.description: Negative altitude alarm threshold (`osdConfig()->neg_alt_alarm`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

fields.name: `itemPositions`
fields.description: Packed X/Y position for each OSD item on screen 0 (`osdLayoutsConfig()->item_pos[0][i]`). Sent even if OSD disabled.

name: MSP_SET_OSD_CONFIG
description: Sets OSD configuration or a single item's position on screen 0.

name: MSP_OSD_CHAR_WRITE
description: Writes character data to the OSD font memory.

fields.name: `address`
fields.description: Starting address in font memory. Size depends on total payload size.

fields.name: `charData`
fields.description: Character bitmap data (54 or 64 bytes per char, depending on format).

name: MSP_VTX_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the current VTX (Video Transmitter) configuration and capabilities.

fields.name: `vtxDeviceType`
fields.description: Enum (`VTXDEV_*`): Type of VTX device detected/configured. `VTXDEV_UNKNOWN` if none.

fields.name: `pitMode`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX is currently in pit mode, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: `vtxReady`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX device reported ready, 0 otherwise.

fields.name: `lowPowerDisarm`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if low power on disarm is enabled (from `vtxSettingsConfig`).

fields.name: `vtxTableAvailable`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if VTX tables (band/power) are available for query.

fields.name: `bandCount`
fields.description: Number of bands supported by the VTX device.

fields.name: `channelCount`
fields.description: Number of channels per band supported by the VTX device.

fields.name: `powerCount`
fields.description: Number of power levels supported by the VTX device.

name: MSP_SET_VTX_CONFIG
description: Sets the VTX configuration (band, channel, power, pit mode). Supports multiple protocol versions/extensions based on payload size.

name: MSP_ADVANCED_CONFIG
description: Retrieves advanced hardware-related configuration (PWM protocols, rates). Some fields are BF compatibility placeholders.

fields.name: `useUnsyncedPwm`
fields.description: Always 1 (BF compatibility, INAV uses async PWM based on protocol).

name: MSP_SET_ADVANCED_CONFIG
description: Sets advanced hardware-related configuration (PWM protocols, rates).

name: MSP_FILTER_CONFIG
description: Retrieves filter configuration settings (Gyro, D-term, Yaw, Accel). Some fields are BF compatibility placeholders or legacy.

fields.name: `gyroMainLpfHz`
fields.description: Gyro main low-pass filter cutoff frequency (`gyroConfig()->gyro_main_lpf_hz`).

name: MSP_SET_FILTER_CONFIG
description: Sets filter configuration settings. Handles different payload lengths for backward compatibility.

name: MSP_PID_ADVANCED
description: Retrieves advanced PID tuning parameters. Many fields are BF compatibility placeholders.

name: MSP_SET_PID_ADVANCED
description: Sets advanced PID tuning parameters.

name: MSP_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Retrieves the configured hardware type for various sensors.

fields.name: `baroHardware`
fields.description: Enum (`baroHardware_e`): Barometer hardware type (`barometerConfig()->baro_hardware`). 0 if `USE_BARO` disabled.

fields.name: `magHardware`
fields.description: Enum (`magHardware_e`): Magnetometer hardware type (`compassConfig()->mag_hardware`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `pitotHardware`
fields.description: Enum (`pitotHardware_e`): Pitot tube hardware type (`pitotmeterConfig()->pitot_hardware`). 0 if `USE_PITOT` disabled.

fields.name: `rangefinderHardware`
fields.description: Enum (`rangefinderHardware_e`): Rangefinder hardware type (`rangefinderConfig()->rangefinder_hardware`). 0 if `USE_RANGEFINDER` disabled.

fields.name: `opflowHardware`
fields.description: Enum (`opticalFlowHardware_e`): Optical flow hardware type (`opticalFlowConfig()->opflow_hardware`). 0 if `USE_OPFLOW` disabled.

name: MSP_SET_SENSOR_CONFIG
description: Sets the configured hardware type for various sensors.

name: MSP_STATUS
description: Provides basic flight controller status including cycle time, errors, sensor status, active modes (first 32), and the current configuration profile.

fields.name: `i2cErrors`
fields.description: Number of I2C errors encountered (`i2cGetErrorCounter()`). 0 if `USE_I2C` not defined.

fields.name: `sensorStatus`
fields.description: Bitmask indicating available/active sensors (`packSensorStatus()`). See notes.

fields.name: `activeModesLow`
fields.description: First 32 bits of the active flight modes bitmask (`packBoxModeFlags()`).

name: MSP_RAW_IMU
description: Provides raw sensor readings from the IMU (Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Magnetometer).

fields.name: `magX`
fields.description: Raw magnetometer X reading (`mag.magADC[X]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magY`
fields.description: Raw magnetometer Y reading (`mag.magADC[Y]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

fields.name: `magZ`
fields.description: Raw magnetometer Z reading (`mag.magADC[Z]`). 0 if `USE_MAG` disabled.

name: MSP_SERVO
description: Provides the current output values for all supported servos.

fields.name: `servoOutputs`
fields.description: Array of current servo output values (typically 1000-2000).

name: MSP_MOTOR
description: Provides the current output values for the first 8 motors.

fields.name: `motorOutputs`
fields.description: Array of current motor output values (typically 1000-2000). Values beyond `MAX_SUPPORTED_MOTORS` are 0.

name: MSP_RC
description: Provides the current values of the received RC channels.

fields.name: `rcChannels`
fields.description: Array of current RC channel values (typically 1000-2000). Length depends on detected channels.

name: MSP_RAW_GPS
description: Provides raw GPS data (fix status, coordinates, altitude, speed, course).

fields.name: `numSat`
fields.description: Number of satellites used in solution (`gpsSol.numSat`).

name: MSP_COMP_GPS
description: Provides computed GPS values: distance and direction to home.

fields.name: `gpsHeartbeat`
fields.description: Indicates if GPS data is being received (`gpsSol.flags.gpsHeartbeat`).

name: MSP_ATTITUDE
description: Provides the current attitude estimate (roll, pitch, yaw).

name: MSP_ALTITUDE
description: Provides estimated altitude, vertical speed (variometer), and raw barometric altitude.

fields.name: `baroAltitude`
fields.description: Latest raw altitude from barometer (`baroGetLatestAltitude()`). 0 if `USE_BARO` disabled.

name: MSP_ANALOG
description: Provides analog sensor readings: battery voltage, current consumption (mAh), RSSI, and current draw (Amps).

fields.name: `rssi`
fields.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator (`getRSSI()`). Units depend on source.

name: MSP_RC_TUNING
description: Retrieves RC tuning parameters (rates, expos, TPA) for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP_ACTIVEBOXES
description: Provides the full bitmask of currently active flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: `activeModes`
fields.description: Bitmask of all active modes (`packBoxModeFlags()`). Size depends on `boxBitmask_t` definition.

name: MSP_MISC
description: Retrieves miscellaneous configuration settings, mostly related to RC, GPS, Mag, and Battery voltage (legacy formats).

name: MSP_BOXNAMES
description: Provides a semicolon-separated string containing the names of all available flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: `boxNamesString`
fields.description: String containing mode names separated by ';'. Null termination not guaranteed by MSP, relies on payload size. (`serializeBoxNamesReply()`).

name: MSP_PIDNAMES
description: Provides a semicolon-separated string containing the names of the PID controllers.

fields.name: `pidNamesString`
fields.description: String "ROLL;PITCH;YAW;ALT;Pos;PosR;NavR;LEVEL;MAG;VEL;". Null termination not guaranteed by MSP.

name: MSP_WP
description: Get/Set a single waypoint from the mission plan.

fields.name: `waypointIndex`
fields.description: Index of the waypoint to retrieve (0 to `NAV_MAX_WAYPOINTS - 1`).

name: MSP_BOXIDS
description: Provides a list of permanent IDs associated with the available flight modes (boxes).

fields.name: `boxIds`
fields.description: Array of permanent IDs for each configured box (`serializeBoxReply()`). Length depends on number of boxes.

name: MSP_SERVO_CONFIGURATIONS
description: Retrieves the configuration parameters for all supported servos (min, max, middle, rate). Legacy format with unused fields.

name: MSP_NAV_STATUS
description: Retrieves the current status of the navigation system.

fields.name: `navMode`
fields.description: Enum (`NAV_MODE_*`): Current navigation mode (None, RTH, WP, Hold, etc.) (`NAV_Status.mode`).

fields.name: `activeWpAction`
fields.description: Enum (`navWaypointActions_e`): Action of the currently executing waypoint (`NAV_Status.activeWpAction`).

fields.name: `activeWpNumber`
fields.description: Index: Index of the currently executing waypoint (`NAV_Status.activeWpNumber`).

fields.name: `targetHeading`
fields.description: degrees: Target heading for heading controller (`getHeadingHoldTarget()`).

name: MSP_3D
description: Retrieves settings related to 3D/reversible motor operation.

name: MSP_RC_DEADBAND
description: Retrieves RC input deadband settings.

name: MSP_SENSOR_ALIGNMENT
description: Retrieves sensor alignment settings (legacy format).

name: MSP_LED_STRIP_MODECOLOR
description: Retrieves the color index assigned to each LED mode and function/direction combination, including special colors.

fields.name: `modeIndex`
fields.description: Index of the LED mode (`ledModeIndex_e`). `LED_MODE_COUNT` for special colors.

fields.name: `directionOrSpecialIndex`
fields.description: Index of the direction (`ledDirection_e`) or special color (`ledSpecialColor_e`).

fields.name: `colorIndex`
fields.description: Index of the color assigned from `ledStripConfig()->colors`.

name: MSP_BATTERY_STATE
description: Provides battery state information, formatted primarily for DJI FPV Goggles compatibility.

name: MSP_VTXTABLE_BAND
description: Retrieves information about a specific VTX band from the VTX table. (Implementation missing in provided `fc_msp.c`)

name: MSP_VTXTABLE_POWERLEVEL
description: Retrieves information about a specific VTX power level from the VTX table.

fields.name: `powerLevelIndex`
fields.description: 1-based index of the power level to query.

name: MSP_SET_RAW_RC
description: Provides raw RC channel data to the flight controller, typically used when the receiver is connected via MSP (e.g., MSP RX feature).

fields.name: `rcChannels`
fields.description: Array of RC channel values (typically 1000-2000). Number of channels determined by payload size.

name: MSP_SET_RAW_GPS
description: Provides raw GPS data to the flight controller, typically for simulation or external GPS injection.

fields.name: `groundCourse`
fields.description: Ground course (units unclear from code, likely degrees or deci-degrees, ignored in current code).

name: MSP_SET_RC_TUNING
description: Sets RC tuning parameters (rates, expos, TPA) for the current control rate profile.

name: MSP_ACC_CALIBRATION
description: Starts the accelerometer calibration procedure.

name: MSP_MAG_CALIBRATION
description: Starts the magnetometer calibration procedure.

name: MSP_SET_MISC
description: Sets miscellaneous configuration settings (legacy formats/scaling).

name: MSP_RESET_CONF
description: Resets all configuration settings to their default values and saves to EEPROM.

name: MSP_SET_WP
description: Sets a single waypoint in the mission plan.

fields.name: `waypointIndex`
fields.description: Index of the waypoint to set (0 to `NAV_MAX_WAYPOINTS - 1`).

name: MSP_SELECT_SETTING
description: Selects the active configuration profile and saves it.

fields.name: `profileIndex`
fields.description: Index of the profile to activate (0-based).

name: MSP_SET_HEAD
description: Sets the target heading for the heading hold controller (e.g., during MAG mode).

name: MSP_SET_SERVO_CONFIGURATION
description: Sets the configuration for a single servo (legacy format).

fields.name: `servoIndex`
fields.description: Index of the servo to configure (0 to `MAX_SUPPORTED_SERVOS - 1`).

name: MSP_SET_MOTOR
description: Sets the disarmed motor values, typically used for motor testing or propeller balancing functions in a configurator.

fields.name: `motorValues`
fields.description: Array of motor values to set when disarmed. Only affects first `MAX_SUPPORTED_MOTORS`.

name: MSP_SET_3D
description: Sets parameters related to 3D/reversible motor operation.

name: MSP_SET_RC_DEADBAND
description: Sets RC input deadband values.

name: MSP_SET_RESET_CURR_PID
description: Resets the PIDs of the *current* profile to their default values. Does not save.

name: MSP_SET_SENSOR_ALIGNMENT
description: Sets sensor alignment (legacy format).

name: MSP_SET_LED_STRIP_MODECOLOR
description: Sets the color index for a specific LED mode/function combination.

fields.name: `modeIndex`
fields.description: Index of the LED mode (`ledModeIndex_e` or `LED_MODE_COUNT` for special).

fields.name: `directionOrSpecialIndex`
fields.description: Index of the direction or special color.

fields.name: `colorIndex`
fields.description: Index of the color to assign from `ledStripConfig()->colors`.

name: MSP_SERVO_MIX_RULES
description: Retrieves the custom servo mixer rules (legacy format).

fields.name: `inputSource`
fields.description: Input source for the mix (RC chan, Roll, Pitch...). See `mixerSource_t`.

name: MSP_SET_SERVO_MIX_RULE
description: Sets a single custom servo mixer rule (legacy format).

fields.name: `ruleIndex`
fields.description: Index of the rule to set (0 to `MAX_SERVO_RULES - 1`).

name: MSP_SET_PASSTHROUGH
direction: In/Out (Special: In command triggers passthrough mode, Reply confirms start)
description: Enables serial passthrough mode to peripherals like ESCs (BLHeli 4-way) or other serial devices.

fields.name: `passthroughMode`
fields.description: Type of passthrough (`mspPassthroughType_e`: Serial ID, Serial Function, ESC 4way).

fields.name: `passthroughArgument`
fields.description: Argument for the mode (e.g., Serial Port Identifier, Serial Function ID). Defaults to 0 if not sent.

name: MSP_RTC
description: Retrieves the current Real-Time Clock time.

fields.name: `seconds`
fields.description: Seconds since epoch (or relative time if not set). 0 if RTC time unknown.

fields.name: `millis`
fields.description: Millisecond part of the time. 0 if RTC time unknown.

name: MSP_SET_RTC
description: Sets the Real-Time Clock time.

fields.name: `seconds`
fields.description: Seconds component of time to set.

fields.name: `millis`
fields.description: Millisecond component of time to set.

name: MSP_EEPROM_WRITE
description: Saves the current configuration from RAM to non-volatile memory (EEPROM/Flash).

name: MSP_DEBUGMSG
description: Retrieves debug ("serial printf") messages from the firmware.

name: MSP_DEBUG
description: Retrieves values from the firmware's `debug[]` array (legacy 16-bit version).

name: MSP_V2_FRAME
description: This ID is used as a *payload indicator* within an MSPv1 message structure (`$M>`) to signify that the following payload conforms to the MSPv2 format. It's not a command itself.

name: MSP_STATUS_EX
description: Provides extended flight controller status, including CPU load, arming flags, and calibration status, in addition to `MSP_STATUS` fields.

fields.name: `armingFlags`
fields.description: Flight controller arming flags (`armingFlags`). Note: Truncated to 16 bits.

name: MSP_SENSOR_STATUS
description: Provides the hardware status for each individual sensor system.

fields.name: `overallHealth`
fields.description: 1 if all essential hardware is healthy, 0 otherwise (`isHardwareHealthy()`).

name: MSP_UID
description: Provides the unique identifier of the microcontroller.

fields.name: `uid0`
fields.description: First 32 bits of the unique ID (`U_ID_0`).

fields.name: `uid1`
fields.description: Middle 32 bits of the unique ID (`U_ID_1`).

fields.name: `uid2`
fields.description: Last 32 bits of the unique ID (`U_ID_2`).

name: MSP_GPSSVINFO
description: Provides satellite signal strength information (legacy U-Blox compatibility stub).

fields.name: `numChannels`
fields.description: Always 0 (Number of SV info channels reported).

name: MSP_GPSSTATISTICS
description: Provides debugging statistics for the GPS communication link.

fields.name: `lastMessageDt`
fields.description: Time since last valid GPS message (`gpsStats.lastMessageDt`).

fields.name: `packetCount`
fields.description: Number of valid GPS packets received (`gpsStats.packetCount`).

name: MSP_TX_INFO
description: Provides information potentially useful for transmitter LUA scripts.

fields.name: `rssiSource`
fields.description: Enum: Source of the RSSI value (`getRSSISource()`).

fields.name: `rtcDateTimeIsSet`
fields.description: Boolean: 1 if the RTC has been set, 0 otherwise.
